ing: 1 pinch salt and black pepper to taste
des: "This recipe is very very tasty, add to any kind of pasta or on pizza dough for a great meal!"
ins: In a food processor, combine the basil, feta cheese, Parmesan cheese, pine nuts, artichoke heart, and sun-dried tomatoes. Cover, and pulse, adding oil as needed to facilitate blending until smooth. Taste, and season with salt and pepper.
